content.question: The work shown was created using which of the following techniques commonly used in Aztec art?

choices.label: Lost-wax casting to create fine details
Carving with stone tools to create a deep relief on the top and sides
Heightening light and shadow effects by leaving the surfaces unpainted
Stamping with stone tools to create designs in clay

content.answer: Carving with stone tools to create a deep relief on the top and sides
